Interface View.Engine

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Body.Formatter

    public static interface View.Engine
extends Body.Formatter
    Special body serializer for dealing with View.

    edgar

      • format

        default void format(Object body,
                    Body.Writer writer)
             throws Exception
        Description copied from interface: Body.Formatter
        Attempt to write a message into the HTTP response body.

        For text format (json, yaml, xml, etc.) a converter usually call to Body.Writer.text(Body.Writer.Text) in order to set charset and close resources.

        For binary format a converter usually call to Body.Writer.bytes(Body.Writer.Bytes) in order to close resources.

        Specified by:
        format in interface Body.Formatter
        Parameters:
        body - A body message.
        writer - A write context.
        Throws:
        Exception - If write operation fail.

      • render

        void render(View viewable,
            Body.Writer writer)
     throws Exception
        Render a view.
        Parameters:
        viewable - View to render.
        writer - A body writer.
        Throws:
        Exception - If view rendering fails.
